actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow employees and self-employed individuals to deduct taxes paid for Social Security and Medicare.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit a deduction for taxes paid by employees and self- employed individuals under the Federal Insurance Contributions Act and the Railroad Retirement Tax Act (social security and medicare taxes).

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow employees and self-employed individuals to deduct taxes paid for Social Security and Medicare.
